mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order_profitsharing SET order_id = #{orderId}, rule_id = #{ruleId}, amount_fee = #{amountFee}, payment_rate = #{paymentRate}, payment_fee = #{paymentFee}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, tax_fee = #{taxFee}, system_income = #{systemIncome}, driver_income = #{driverIncome}, `status` = 1
